page.title: 09THE JUNIOR ORANGE ORDER
page.content: I'm a junior member of the Orange Order and I attend Edenmore Orange Hall one Thursday in every month. My uncle is an Orangeman and so is my grandfather. Some people ask me what it's like and I always say that it's a bit like church. We have a band and a beautiful banner. On special days we line up behind them and march through the streets wearing our sashes. The best day of all is the twelfth of July when everybody is out at the same time. Last year we took a bus to Londonderry and marched to a huge field and had lemonade and crisps, and talked to all our friends. It was the best day of the year. WRITTEN BY JARVIS (aged 11)
